quote: English - How are you? - IsiXhosa - Unjani? - IsiZulu - Unjani? - Tshiven_a - Hurini?/ Vhari mini? - Afrikaans - Hoe gaan dit?

quote: English - I am fine, thnak you - IsiXhosa - Ndiphilile enkosi, unjani wena? - IsiZulu - Ngiyaphila, unjani wena? - Tshiven_a - Ndi hone, ndi vhudzisa ngeo - Afrikaans - Met my gaan dit goed, dankie

quote: English - Whats your name? - IsiXhosa - Ngubani igama lakho? - IsiZulu - Ubani igama lakho? - Tshiven_a - Dzina _anu ndi nnyi? - Afrikaans - Wat is jou naam?
name: Greetings & Conversations( informal and formal)

quote: English - My name is.. - IsiXhosa - Igama lam ngu.. - IsiZulu - Igama lami ngu… - Tshiven_a - Dzina _anga ndipfi… - Afrikaans - My naam is..
